snippet.title: KNIGHTMARE TOWER - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Knightmare Tower is available on PC (Steam), Mac, Linux, iOS, Ouya and Google Play!
http://www.knightmaretower.com

http://store.steampowered.com/app/298400/
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id633478986
https://itunes.apple.com/app/knightmare-tower-free/id757058533
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.juicybeast.knightmaretower

You can follow us on:

Our website: http://juicybeast.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/juicybeast
